resources.string: You Can Ask Your Question By Clicking the add button. The button enables you to write your Question and "-> " clickable button. Once You click the send arrow your question will be automatically send for other Users registered on the app.
You will use this app to ask educational questions and get Answers form either student or Teachers.

In the room you add answer to any question raised by members. Under every questions there is place provided for room members to give answer to the question. Your answer will directly go only to the questioner as a notification.
A notification will be send to You when room members add an answer to your question. Dont forget to check your phone notification bar.
